# Next.js Portfolio Project

## Project Overview
Next.js portfolio website with Tailwind CSS featuring:
- ✅ Home page with hero section
- ✅ About section
- ✅ Projects showcase
- ✅ Skills section
- ✅ Contact form
- ✅ Responsive navigation
- ✅ Footer with social links

## Setup Status
- ✅ Project scaffolding complete
- ✅ Tailwind CSS configured
- ✅ All portfolio components created
- ✅ Dependencies installed
- ✅ Development server running at http://localhost:3000

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Ensure responsive design for all screen sizes
- Optimize for performance

## Customization Needed
Replace the following placeholders with your actual information:
- Your name in Hero component
- About section personal information
- Real project data with actual links
- Your skill set in Skills component
- Social media links in Footer component
- Implement actual form submission in Contact component

## Next Steps
1. Open http://localhost:3000 in your browser
2. Customize components with your information
3. Add your own projects and skills
4. Test responsiveness on different devices
5. Deploy to Vercel or your preferred platform
